A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Nice effects but the rest varies from good to terrible. This movie has terrible writing\, shows no respect to the previous\, makes bad puns that does not fit and forces political opinions.
The movie seems to lack a basic understanding of time and space travel\,  more than the other movies.
The pacing is bad and the movie is a bit to long overall.
This movie made me miss The Phantom Menace even.
